# 5. Dimensionality reduction techniques

- Data overview


```{r human}
getwd()
library(openxlsx)
library(dplyr)
library(GGally)
library(corrplot)
human <- read.csv("human.csv", sep = ",", header = TRUE)
dim(human)
colnames(human)
glimpse(human)
ggpairs(human)
cor(human) %>% corrplot()
```


- PCA on standardized human data set
library(dplyr)
human_std <- scale(human)
summary(human_std)
pca_human <- prcomp(human_std)
biplot(pca_human, choices = 1:2)
s <- summary(pca_human)
